title: 108_hr2078
content: Employees' Pension Equity Act of 2003 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to require the funding of all other employees' non-executive pension plans to be within a certain range in relation to the funding for executive pension plans for highly compensated employees, if both types of pension plans are maintained by the same employer. Sets a five-percent limit on the excess executive plan funding percentage for a plan year .
